snippet: For France, a nation very much in love with its words, televised panel discussions engage in stylish, if not always thoughtful, gladiatorial sport.
abstract: Televised panel discussions on French television are taken very seriously, keeping with a nation very much in love with its words.
lead_paragraph: For France, a nation very much in love with its words, televised panel discussions engage in stylish, if not always thoughtful, gladiatorial sport.

headline.seo: The French Love Their Talk Shows
headline.main: The Chic, Lethal Salons on the Screens of France
headline.print_headline: The Chic, Lethal Salons On the Screens of France
